title: Google Chrome security advisory (AV25-164)
description: On March 25, 2025, Google published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: Stable channel Chrome for desktop   versions prior to 134.0.6998.177/178 (Windows)
Extended Stable Channel   versions prior to 134.0.6998.178 (Windows)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
